attributes.action: Change the way PE Lessons and School Sports are run.
attributes.additional_details: I believe and have seen that doing PE correctly helps children's health and well being,more important it really helps with their social side helping with less mental health. We need to change the way we coach/teach sports,its needs to be fun and more importantly work on the children's CONFIDENCE.In the long run this will help with less obesity as the children will do physical activity when they leave school,helping with less mental health,better social side, thus a less cost to our fantastic NHS
attributes.background: I have worked in primary schools for 18 years I have seen the school sports provision become a second education needs.PE lessons get moved or even cancel for other things in schools.School sports need to be fun.Let's work on their confidence and social side and make it as important as English/Maths

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to change the national curriculum for PE. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
